name: Profano
description:
[Global Game Jam 2023 Prototype]

Profano is a first-person survival horror game with monochromatic art and elements of psychological horror. Manuel is a prospector of dubious character, to say the least, who is trapped in a trance by Tokonimé, the Guardian of Nature. And so the great paradigm arises...

Who is the real monster? The one who afflicts or the ones who retaliate? Come through a new perspective, accompany the suffering of guilt, and the unending search for redemption. Discover a new way of seeing the world through the eyes of the hunted and the hunter, at different times and from different perspectives, the greatest monster can become the greatest prey.




[Credits]
